#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
vector<int> a[10001];
int n;
int visited[10001];
 
int ways(int x){
	if(x==n) return 1;
	if(visited[x]==-1){
		int f=0;
        int t=a[x].size();
		for(int i=0; i<t; i++){
				f+=ways(a[x][i]);
        }
		
		visited[x]=f;
	}
    return visited[x];
}
 
int main(){
	cin>>n;
    memset(visited,-1,sizeof(visited));
	int x=1,y=1;
	while(x!=0 && y!=0){
		scanf("%d %d", &x, &y);
		a[x].push_back(y);
	}
    int m=ways(1);
    printf("%d", m);
	
}
